title: Saigon University Sightseeing
KLF: KLF, where students can use internet service for a certain fee, find documents with a giant bookcase.
B03: In front of the school canteen
THP: Tuition fees collection and scholarship receipt information place.
ATM: ATM of AGRIBANK, where students can withdraw cash directly without going to the bank.
KTHB: Self-study area, an area for students to study on by themselves, eat or take a lunch break.
GXGV: Lecturers, officials and employees parking lots.

A03: In front of meeting room A
KTHC: Self-study area, an area for students to study on by themselves, eat or take a lunch break.
instruction: Use mouse to control the panorama
TV: The library is a place where students can borrow and books, find and read documents and textbooks of many different disciplines
KNU: Students drinking water area, where students can get free drinking water.
confirm_direct_sguhome: Do you want to redirect to the Saigon University homepage?
CSNT: Back Gate. Usually the gate used for starting field trips or school sporting events.
